name: Deep Sea Cleaner
description:
Catch the trash floating around in the sea. But be careful not to catch the fish.

W,A,S,D to move.  Clean up the trash and try not to hurt the fish. 

Note: I haven't been able to implement the grappling hook yet. If you touch trash or fish with the front of the ship you will automatically collect or hurt the item.  Grappling hook to come later.
